title: Usbc earbuds problem
content:
Im just purchased pixel USBC earbuds for my pixel 2 xl, it is work at the 3rd times im plugged, but then, for the 4th till now, my 2 XL just recognize the earbuds as a usb charger. I tried to follow the instruction on the community (reboot, going to safe mode, factory reset, cleaning the port using toothpick) but still, my pixel 2XL just recognize it as usb charger, i tried to enter to developers mode, and change my setting in USB to MIDI, but nothing happen.

Plis somebody help me, because im start stressful of this issue.

Thanks
